bibl.title: Late Antique Egyptian Funerary Sculpture. Images for This World and the Next.
bibl.note: Introductory Remarks: Some Problems of Interpretation. - Part 1. Late Antique Egyptian Funerary Sculpture. - Part 2. Monuments of This World. - Part 3. Images for the Next World. - Concluding Remarks: A Broader Interpretive Setting. - Notes. - Bibliography. - Index.
bibl.seg: THOMAS Thelma K., Late Antique Egyptian Funerary Sculpture. Images for This World and the Next.
Princeton, Princeton University Press, 2000, 8°, xxv-163 pp., 126 figg. h.t. ISBN 0-691-03468-0. $55.

Introductory Remarks: Some Problems of Interpretation. - Part 1. Late Antique Egyptian Funerary Sculpture. - Part 2. Monuments of This World. - Part 3. Images for the Next World. - Concluding Remarks: A Broader Interpretive Setting. - Notes. - Bibliography. - Index.

C.R. par Dominique Bénazeth, BibO 58 (2001) coll. 142-147. - Peter Grossmann, BZ 95 (2002) pp. 152-155. - Christina Riggs, JEA 86 (2000) pp. 202-204. - Elizabeth Valdez del Alamo, BMCRev < http://ccat.sas.upenn.edu/bmcr/2002/2002-02-28.html >. - Robert Steven Bianchi, JARCE 38 (2001) pp. 147-148. - Elizabeth S. Bolman, AJA 105 (2001) pp. 379-380. - Susan Walker, JRA 15 (2002) pp. 686-687.
